mapper.select: select vs.vs_no, vs.vs_title, vs.vs_writer, vs.vs_date as vs_date, 'vs' as source from community_vs as vs union all select yooka.cm_no, yooka.cm_title, yooka.cm_writer, yooka.cm_date as vs_date, 'yooka' as source from community_yooka as yooka union all select noriter.cm_no, noriter.cm_title, noriter.cm_writer, noriter.cm_date as vs_date, 'noriter' as source from community_noriter as noriter union all select shopping.cm_no, shopping.cm_title, shopping.cm_writer, shopping.cm_date as vs_date, 'shopping' as source from community_shopping as shopping order by vs_date desc limit 5;
select t_no, t_product, t_date from trade order by t_date desc limit 5;
select * from product order by rand() limit 4;
select * from product order by p_no desc limit 5;
select * from user order by u_date desc limit 5;
select u_date, count(*) as u_count from user group by u_date;
